ValidationRule.description: Wholesaler Fee not permitted on Apollo admitted quotes in this state.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT($RecordType.Name = "Scale") &&
AND( ISPICKVAL(Admitted__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Received"), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2022-11-21"), Marketer_UW_Name__r.Account.Name = "Apollo Brokers", (OR( Account_Location_State__c = "Alaska", Account_Location_State__c = "District of Columbia", Account_Location_State__c = "Florida", Account_Location_State__c = "Georgia", Account_Location_State__c = "Hawaii", Account_Location_State__c = "Indiana", Account_Location_State__c = "Kentucky", Account_Location_State__c = "Maine", Account_Location_State__c = "Maryland", Account_Location_State__c = "Michigan", Account_Location_State__c = "Mississippi", Account_Location_State__c = "Montana", Account_Location_State__c = "Nebraska", Account_Location_State__c = "Nevada", Account_Location_State__c = "New Hampshire", Account_Location_State__c = "Rhode Island", Account_Location_State__c = "South Carolina", Account_Location_State__c = "South Dakota", Account_Location_State__c = "Tennessee", Account_Location_State__c = "Utah", Account_Location_State__c = "Vermont", Account_Location_State__c = "Virginia", Account_Location_State__c = "West Virginia", Account_Location_State__c = "Wyoming")), Wholesale_Fees__c > 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Wholesaler Fee not permitted on Apollo admitted quotes in this state.
